about.title: Hey, I'm Tom
about.subtitle: I Build What Works
about.content:
For 20+ years, I've helped Connecticut businesses grow online. After building (and losing) my own multi-million dollar business when systems failed, I learned what really matters: **simple tools that work**.

No fancy jargon. No bloated features. Just practical websites and automation that help you serve customers better and grow steadily.

items.name: Mike R.
items.quote: Tom built us a website that actually brings in leads. Our phone rings more in a week than it used to in a month. Best investment we've made.

items.quote: I was terrified of tech stuff. Tom made everything so simple. Now clients can book online 24/7 and I get automatic reminders. It just works.
